title: Blank screen 115 version on linux mint
content: Since the latest update to 115.3.1 (on linux mint) the mail tab shows blank screen including the calendar pane. Other tabs are fine. Also can see the mails when open in troubleshoot mode.
creator: markus76

title: Why can't I sign in after update115
content: Sorry for posting this here but no response in TB forum. After I installed the latest up grade TB 115 I have lost all the old emails in my inbox, sent, and trash as well as the ability to use TB as I can't sign in. I get the following prompt when trying to use my account. "Sending of password for user ****@att.net did not succeed. Mail server inbound.att.net responded: [SYS/TEMP] Server error - Please try again later", and then a prompt to "Enter your password" which does not work, although the pass word shows up in"passwords". The TB account works fine in the Yahoo web account, but I don't keep anything there on a daily basis. The web TB account lets me send and receive mail normally. I haven't changed my configuration ,password or uninstalled TB. My G mail works normally. My android cell also won't let me sign in and asks for credentials per password which is unrecognized.
creator: Bob9754

title: How to automatically back up bookmarks to device
content:
Hi, how to automatically save or "backup" bookmarks to my account?

So that let's suppose I go to another computer, open up my account, and all my bookmarks will be there?

My computer got reset and all data deleted, and when I logged into FF again, all the bookmarks were gone.

I don't want to manually backup my bookmarks, it should be done automatically and connected to the account and stored on the FF server.

How to do this, is there even a way?
creator: resolve.famous

title: Firefox and Firefox dev Not Opening Only When Not In Windows Safe Mode
content:
I've been having trouble with firefox.exe and even the dev installer. The Installer work adds it to one of the icons to the bottom tray in windows then when I go to open it I look in task manager and one process is ran but then seems to be terminated right away. But when I reload windows in safe mode I go to open firefox.exe and it works fine except for the fact that there is no internet.

Also if this helps when hovering over the icon in the tray it doesn't show like the most recent websites. But it shows in windows safe mode.

Note I've tried a lot of things. Fully reinstalled firefox; tried to run firefox safe-mode tried to use firefox dev executable reset the base settings for Firefox tried turning off wifi doesn't matter tried making new profile

So if none of that works can you send me to a place so I can get my history data from my account, this is because I use my phone with Firefox.

python code i dont know what to do so I just trying everything to make it easier for you to help me, and I thank you.

import os try: 

   os.system("firefox.exe")    # opens then closes, not window is poped up

except: 

   # run windows in safe mode    # works but no internet

finally: 

   # contact support for that glimmer of hope
creator: loganboganfarfignogan
